author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is intended to fix the issues reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/26236, which were subsequent to the merge of #24501
The test PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/test/patTuple_PATandPF2PAT_cfg.py was testing a few configs not touched in the standard workflows, and which were evidently badly configured in the fillDescription of the relevant producers

A previous attempt was made with #26252, but while testing it it hits a segmentation violation in fastsim: that seems to be related to the fix.
Let retry this other possible fix, before giving up.

This PR:
- adjusts those fillDescriptions() so that all needed parameters can be included and validated;
- avoids duplicating a few configs, by renaming the default ones produced by the configuration validation (or by simply removing PFRecoTauProducer_cfi.py as a whole, it being a duplicate of the one created by fillDescriptions());
- removes the useless specific definitions of hltPFTauPiZeros & hltPFTauPiZerosReg in the fillDescriptions(), which are never used as such and add nothing to the validation

Still  to be done:
- Further cleaning the duplicate modules
- Possibly avoid replicas of validations, see for example all the variants included in RecoTauPiZeroProducer::fillDescriptions() which I bet they could more conveniently get specialized in the cfi config starting from a common parameterSetValidation

@swozniewski @mbluj please have a look. 

#### PR validation:

Tested running the previously failing PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/test/patTuple_PATandPF2PAT_cfg.py
It passes the unit test "fastsim1", which fails in #26252
Short matrix also succeeds
title: Fix configurations and their descriptions in recoTau
